#8 in Cell Phone Mounts
#26 in Cell Phone Automobile Cradles
OS Windows Phone, IOS, Android
Special Features Travel, Fit Big Phones, Ultra Stable, Fit Both Vertical or Horizontal Vents, One Hand Operation, Innovative Quick Release, 360° Rotation Car Phone Mount
Colour Black
Included Components 1 * Phone Cradle for Universal Phones & Cases, 1 * User Manual, Lifetime Service & Free Replacement, 1 * Alternative Car Vent Clip for hot summer day
Manufacturer andobil
Country of Origin China
Date First Available May 23, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $19.59
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:14:55 UTC – Details)

From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

【Phone’s Safe Like in an Infant Seat】This car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
【0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operation】 andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
【360° Flexible Rotation as Wish】 Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
【Wide Compatible with All Smartphones】 This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
【Andobil Car Phone Holder Service】 Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.


Compatible with All Cellphones in 4”-7” size:

iPhone Series Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13, 12 Pro,12,12 Mini, iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, 8 Plus, 8, X, XS max, XS, XR, 7 Plus, 7, etc.
Samsung Series Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S22, S21 Ultra, S20, S10, S9, S8, S7 Edge, Note 20, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, etc.
LG Series Compatible with LG G8, G7 ThinQ, G6+, V50, V40 ThinQ, V30, Stylo 4, Optimus, etc.
Google Series Compatible with Google Pixel 4, 4XL, 3, 3XL, 2, 2XL, XL, Nexus 6P, 6, 7, 5X, etc.
Huawei Series Compatible with Huawei Mate 40, Mate 30 Pro, Mate 20, P40, P30, P20, etc
Oneplus Series Compatible with Oneplus 7 Pro, 6T, 6, 5T, 5, X, etc.
Other Cellphone Series Compatible with Moto G7, Z3, Nokia 7.1/ 6.1, etc.

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $19.59
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:14:55 UTC – Details)

item.title: andobil Car Phone Holder Mount [2022 Upgraded] Smartphone Air Vent Holder Easy Clamp Hands-Free Compatible with iPhone 11 12 13 14 Pro Max 6 7 8 X XR XS SE Samsung Galaxy S22/S21/S20+/S10/S9/Note 20
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) [2022 Upgraded Newest Version] It is the first one within the market that adapts the aviation material “PTFE”. With the metal vent clip [stronger & tighter]. Screw the clamp and the rubber clip hook will catch one of the car air vent blades tightly, even if you hit a bump ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $25.99 - $22.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:46:15 UTC – Details)



[2022 Upgraded Newest Version] It is the first one within the market that adapts the aviation material “PTFE”. With the metal vent clip [stronger & tighter]. Screw the clamp and the rubber clip hook will catch one of the car air vent blades tightly, even if you hit a bump or a sharper turn. So this vent phone holder could work well for you in extremely Driving environments. – Never Broke & Super Stable
[One Handed Operation & Drive without Distracting] Andobil design engineers upgraded the switch button, which not only made it easier to press it, but also made it quick to open the arm for only 0.1S. Mount or remove your phone in seconds with the patented Easy Clamp. – Easy to Use
[Easy to Adjust & Multiple Viewing Angle] This car mount for phone has a highly flexible ball-joint 360° rotation that provides infinite viewing angles. The phone car mount allows quick switching between vertically and landscape view .Position your phone at the perfect angle to enjoy a more relaxed and safer drive. – Best Driving Angle
[Adjustable Foot Design, Universal Compatibility ] – Andobil product manager designed adjustable foot of car phone holders. Avoid some cell phone power or volume button will be squeezed by the clamp arm. Meanwhile, the adjust foot improve the compatibility making this car cell phone holder fit for all smartphones. BTW, You don’t need to remove your thick case while using this phone holder car. – Big Phones & Thick Case Friendly
[Andobil Worry-Free Vouchsafing] – ANDOBIL vent phone holder for car always provide 24-month of worranty-support. – 12 hours quick response service

4.5
Price: $25.99 - $22.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:46:15 UTC – Details)

[Securely Stable for Most Vents]: With the extended vent clip, easy to hook the car phone holder on most AC vents by rotating the knob. The car phone holder mount will stay in place even if you hit a bump or a sharp turn, which ensures a distraction-free road trip
[Super Easy to install]: Have the phone holder connected to the universal air vent clip, the total installation takes 5s only, that is it! No need to waste your good time to study the complex instruction. Sleek phone mount for your beloved car
[Truly Durable & Perfect Protection]: The surface of the car mount for iphone is fully protected by silicone, provides securely grip power and protects your costful phone from wear and tear
[Adjustable As You Wish]: Flexible adjustment makes this cell phone automobile cradle Versatile – Adjustable Bottom Foot to fit for all phones + Release Button behind to offer a more convenience operation + 360° Rotation Ball Joint to turn from portrait to landscape mode as your preference

Price: $19.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:11:18 UTC – Details)

item.title: Ontel Brella Shield Windshield Sun Shade by Arctic Air, Compact Design Pops Open Like an Umbrella and Fits Cars, Trucks & SUVs – One-Size (31×57) – As Seen on TV
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshieldFoldable Design For Easy Storage – ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)



Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshield
Foldable Design For Easy Storage – When done using, just click the locking latch and pop the sun blocker shut into its compact size to easily store it in the dashboard, door panel or even under the seat without taking up any extra space
Sunshade Umbrella For Most Vehicles – The retractable shade collapses to less than 1 square foot instantly, and its universal size works equally well with the windshields of trucks, cars or even SUVs
Protect Your Car’s Interior – This car window cover is designed to block intense heat and harmful UV rays from the sun to help keep the inside of your car cooler, while preventing the car seats, upholstery and dashboard from fading and cracking
Privacy & Safety – The sun blocking screen provides shade to your car, truck, SUV or RV whether you are driving to work or halting mid-way on the road. It keeps your vehicle at a safe temperature while also maintaining complete privacy

3.5
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine | Built-in Air Motor | EVAP Vacuum Leak Detector Tester | Shop Series Plus | Made in The USA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $149.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:40 UTC – Details)



【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!
【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)
【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS WITH ADAPTERS】Consistently smoke test EVAP systems, Vacuum leaks, low pressure Turbo leaks, Intake Manifolds, Cooling / EGR / Exhaust Systems, worn rubber, gaskets, seals, connectors, and more! The tapered smoke injection nozzle fits into virtually all hoses and lines.
【 PRECISE AND SAFE】Engineered 100% safe for all vehicles. Thick Smoke output detects even the smallest leaks. Every unit Is backed by 1 YEAR FULL COVERAGE WARRANTY! AS AN AMERICAN FAMILY BUSINESS, we stand proudly behind our products. If you have any issues, don’t hesitate to contact us directly.
【 HOW DOES IT WORK?】(1) Fill with the included OEM Approved Smoke Fluid. The kit operates with the included OEM Approved Fluid or you may use your own USP Mineral Oil / Baby Oil. (2) Fasten the Power Cable (3) Warm up for 3 minutes and then turn on the Built-In Air Motor. (4) Check for LEAKS with Smoke Detection Technology.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:40 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MUYI 20 PIECES DECORATION STRIP, personalized decor for your car vent outlet. Makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience!

Decoration Trim Product Size Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth.

Perfect selection for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

MUYI 20 PIECES AIR OUTLET TRIM Features

Soft PVC, electroplated processU-shaped design, tighten automaticallyFree cuttingWaterproof and Sun CareMultiple color options20pcs per package Attention PLEASE!

PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The air outlet is upscale and full of atmosphere after installation.

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The front grille is full of personality and dazzling after installation.

ONLY SUITABLE FOR STRIP AIR OUTLETS!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Horizontal Vent

Suitable for horizontal vents.

Vertical Vent

Suitable for 90% of vertical vents with no curves.

Horizontal Round Vent

Only fit for vents with flat and straight fan blades.

NONE OF THE FOLLOWING AIR OUTLETS ARE SUITABLE!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for irregular round vent with no fan blades.

Round Vent

Not suitable for round vent with curvy fan blades.

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for round vents with fixed inner circles.

Width
0.16 inches 0.16 inches 0.16 inches

Height
0.3 inches 0.3 inches 0.3 inches

Personalized Decor – Those 20-pieces shiny decoration strip makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience.
Durable Quality – Made of high quality PVC material in Plating Effect. MUYI car vent strim accessory features with waterproof, corrosion resistant, bendable, can be used for a long time without worry of breakdown, fade and scratch.
Universal Design – U-shaped design, seamlessly fits. Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth. Suitable for straight air vent outlet grille type, as you can see from photo, not suitable for arc, curve or round type. PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!
Handy Operation – Convenient and easy to use. Step 1, you need to Wipe clean the outlet before installation. Step 2, measure and compare the size, use scissor to cut the length that match the air outlet. Step 3, open the strip and snap on the air vent outlet.
Package Include – Pack of 20 pieces car vent outlet trims. Make your car interior more sparkling and stylish. It also a perfect gifts for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

MATTER OF MINUTES: Breathe freely and sleep better as the air purifier uses 360° VortexAir Technology 3.0 and 3-stage filtration to ensure top-notch air purification
QUIET OPERATION: Sleep soundly without loud rattling coming from your air purifier. This little air purifier keeps noise levels as low as 25dB while keeping your space fresh
AROMATHERAPY: Struggling with pet odors or musty smells, Add a few drops of fragrant essential oils to the aroma pad to keep your space smelling great
SAVE SPACE: Tired of dragging a bulky purifier back and forth, Light, travel-friendly, and compact, the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier (6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 in) easily fits in any bedroom, office, or living room, creating less clutter and more fresh air

Learn More
Learn More
Learn More
Learn More


Feeling down with poor air quality?

Previous page

  1. Does your air feel stuffy?

    Small rooms can have poor air circulation, making them feel stuffy—especially when outdoor pollution is bad.

  2. Struggling to sleep?

    It’s hard to sleep soundly when airborne pollutants, such as dust and pollen, cause headaches, congestion, and coughing.

  3. Finding it hard to concentrate?

    Smoky smells, pollen from desk flowers, and airborne dust can make it difficult to focus at work.

  4. Noticing pet dander and smell?

    We love our pets, but these cute furry friends can come with pet dander and odors that lower our air quality.

Next page

Want to combat these issues but running into problems like these…

Poor Performance

Some air purifiers can run all night, but still do little to improve our air quality.

Loud & Noisy

Many conventional air purifiers operate with high noise levels, making it hard to fall asleep.

Too Big & Bulky

Lots of air purifiers are so big, it’s hard to find space for them in small rooms.

No Fragrance

Many air purifiers don’t offer the ability to add essential oils.

Finally, Meet the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

Previous page
Next page

The results? It has seriously made a world of difference!

No space is too small for this compact air purifier

Put it on your nightstand

Noticed a difference in sleep quality

Use it at the office

Put all your energy into your work

Place it on your dresser

Reduced the amount of dust on your dresser

Refresh your living room

It circulates the air well and makes it feel fresh.

“Mini” but Great

  1. We can’t always do great things, but we can do ‘mini’ things with great love.

    Whether you’re putting together your nursery, upgrading your workspace, or adding aromatherapy to your room—discover the “Great” difference one “Mini” air purifier can make.

  2. Every Mini Detail

    Every aspect of the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier is designed with thoughtful innovation, so you can create a healthy space that’s just right for you.

4.5
Price: $49.99 - $41.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:19 UTC – Details)
